nodes.text: Brask Oto Command Station was a facility set up by the Chiss Ascendancy at the entry of The Redoubt. The station itself acted as a battle station.

It was shaped like a double pyramid, and was under the command of Station Commander Prard'enc'iflar.
The crew and guests of the Chaf Envoy briefly stopped there on their journey to Outbound Flight in 22 ABY.
